ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: We provide the collection of data-sets used in the book 'An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R, Second Edition'. These include many data-sets that we used in the first edition (some with minor changes), and some new datasets.

We provide the collection of data-sets used in the book 'An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R, Second Edition'. These include many data-sets that we used in the first edition (some with minor changes), and some new datasets.

name: r-islr2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3-2" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-islr2
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ISLR2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ISLR2/ISLR2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d66f93907dea9417e21bd5252c8d862497762ecb44cd877dfc34665d162d5f52

build:
  number: 3
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]

  host:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ISLR2')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ISLR2')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.statlearning.com
  dev_url: https://cran.r-project.org/package=ISLR2
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: We provide the collection of data-sets used in the book 'An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R, Second Edition'. These include many data-sets that we used in the first edition (some with minor changes), and some new datasets.
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:
